system.name: StartDate
system.label: Start date
system.comment: The date the license become valid.

system.name: ID
system.label: License ID
system.comment: The ID of the license. Must be unique for the system it is installed on.

system.name: HostName
system.label: Host names
system.comment: The name of the system the license is for. There may be multiple HostName nodes. If any match, the licence is valid. The value is either '*' for anything, the name of the host 'server1', or a domain name, with matching going right to left. 'infoshare.local' would match  'server1.infoshare.local', but not 'server1.infoshare.local.uk'.

system.name: FeedODBC
system.label: ODBC feeds
system.comment: Can an ODBC connection be used in a feed?

system.name: MaxProjects
system.label: Maximum number of projects
system.comment: The maximum number of projects in a system.

system.name: ManualConnect
system.label: Allow Manual connect
system.comment: Can the use do manual connects.

system.name: ReportODBC
system.label: ODBC reports
system.comment: Can a report output to an ODBC connection.

system.name: EditScripts
system.label: Edit scripts
system.comment: Can the user edit python scripts

system.name: ReportScript
system.label: Reporting scripts
system.comment: Can scripts be used in reports?

system.name: SystemLevel
system.label: System level
system.comment: The level of the system. bronze, silver, gold.

system.name: LogActions
system.label: Log user actions
system.comment: Are actions logged to the user log in admin DB?

system.name: Workflow
system.label: Enable workflow
system.comment: Is workflow enabled in the GUI?

system.name: Security
system.label: Enable security
system.comment: Is security configuration enabled in the GUI?

project.name: MaxSourceRecords
project.label: Maximum source records
project.comment: The maximum number of source records in a project.

project.name: MaxPosMatch
project.label: Maximum possible matches
project.comment: The maximum number of possible match rules in a project.

project.name: MaxDataCategories
project.label: Maximum data categories
project.comment: The maximum number of data categories. Includes default categories.

project.name: MaxDataFeeds
project.label: Maximum data feeds
project.comment: The maximum number of data feeds in a project.

project.name: MaxDatasets
project.label: Maximum datasets
project.comment: The maximum number of data sets in a project.

project.name: MaxDataObjects
project.label: Maximum data objects
project.comment: Maximum number of data objects in a project.

project.name: MaxReports
project.label: Maximum reports
project.comment: Maximum number of reports in a project.

project.name: MaxDefaultReports
project.label: Maximum default reports
project.comment: Maximum number of default reports in a project. This should normally be '8'.
